listTypedInputs

public com.google.common.collect.Multimap<URI,URI> listTypedInputs(URI operationUri)
Given an operation, this method obtains the list of input URIs mapped to their annotated types (i.e., modelReferences). Note that the same input may have several annotations indicating the type.

Specified by:
listTypedInputs in interface ServiceManager
Overrides:
listTypedInputs in class ServiceManagerSparql
Parameters:
operationUri - the URI for which we want to obtain the inputs and their annotated types
Returns:
a Multimap with the inputs and their corresponding types.

addService

public URI addService(uk.ac.open.kmi.msm4j.Service service)
               throws ServiceException
Creates a Service Description in the system. Only needs to be fed with an MSM Service description.

After successfully adding a service, implementations of this method should raise a ServiceCreatedEvent

Specified by:
addService in interface ServiceManager
Overrides:
addService in class ServiceManagerSparql
Parameters:
service - the input service description in terms of MSM
Returns:
the URI this service description was saved to
Throws:
ServiceException

clearServices

public boolean clearServices()
                      throws ServiceException
Deletes all the services on the registry. This operation cannot be undone. Use with care.

After successfully clearing the services, implementations of this method should raise a ServicesClearedEvent

Specified by:
clearServices in interface ServiceManager
Overrides:
clearServices in class ServiceManagerSparql
Returns:
true if the service registry was cleared.
Throws:
ServiceException

Specified by:

Parameters:

Returns:
